snippet: The I.R.S. told investigators looking into accusations of politically motivated misconduct that two years’ worth of emails sent and received by an official, Lois Lerner, had been destroyed.
abstract: Internal Revenue Service commissioner John Koskinen will testify before House committees on the disappearance of thousands of emails sent and received by Lois Lerner, former head of the IRS's division on tax-exempt organizations.
lead_paragraph: The I.R.S. told investigators looking into accusations of politically motivated misconduct that two years’ worth of emails sent and received by an official, Lois Lerner, had been destroyed.

headline.seo: Tax Agency Says Lois Lerner Emails Were Destroyed in Computer Crash
headline.main: I.R.S. Commissioner to Testify on Ex-Official’s Lost Emails
headline.print_headline: I.R.S. Commissioner to Testify on Ex-Official’s Lost Emails
